    • Maze

      public Maze(int rows, int cols, String mazeName, String authorName, String dateTimeCreated, String logo)
      Creates a maze
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows in the maze
      cols - The number of columns in the maze
      mazeName - The name of the maze
      authorName - The author of the maze
      dateTimeCreated - When the maze was created
      logo - The filepath to the logo

    • Maze

      public Maze(int rows, int cols, String mazeName, String authorName, String dateTimeCreated)

      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows in the maze
      cols - The number of columns in the maze
      mazeName - The name of the maze
      authorName - The author of the maze
      dateTimeCreated - When the maze was created
